text:
Question 80) Pesticides are substances used to promote pest control. However, after its application in open environments, some organochlorine pesticides are dragged by water to lakes and rivers, and as passed through the fish gills, they can spread to their lipid tissues and accumulate there.
The characteristic of these compounds, responsible for the process described in the text, is the
A) Low polarity.
B) Low molecular mass.
C) occurrence of halogens.
D) Small size of molecules.
E) presence of hydroxyls in chains.
